attributes.action: Stop the government selling off 49% of Air Traffic Control (NATS) to foreign companies - especially Germany
attributes.additional_details:
The government should not proceed with the proposed sell-off of 49% of NATS - Air Traffic Control - to any foreign company or country.
Control of our airspace is VITAL for the safety of our country. The favoured bidder at present seems to be Germany - which would be a disaster!!

The government should hold a debate in parliament to discuss this - not do so behind closed doors.
